briefdescription.para: Validate NVS key name for ESP32.
Validate NVS namespace name for ESP32.
Validate NVS value size for ESP32.
Get maximum supported value size for given type.
ESP32 NVS type definitions for hardware abstraction.

detaileddescription.para: This header defines only the essential NVS-specific types used by the EspNvs implementation. Clean and minimal approach.
